entry.title: Incident with API Requests, Git Operations, Issues and Pull Requests
entry.content:
Mar 20, 17:01 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 20, 16:44 UTC
Update - We continue to investigate the cause of high latency across multiple GitHub services.

Mar 20, 16:02 UTC
Update - We are investigating reports of high latency in issues, pull requests, and git operations.

Mar 20, 15:56 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for API Requests, Git Operations, Issues and Pull Requests.

entry.title: Incident with Actions, Packages and Pages
entry.content:
Mar 15, 15:27 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 15, 15:21 UTC
Update - Packages is continuing to recover well. Error rates are back to normal and request latency continues to drop. Next update in 10 minutes.

Mar 15, 15:17 UTC
Update - Packages is now experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Mar 15, 15:10 UTC
Update - Our mitigation for Packages is progressing well. We are adding capacity back and beginning to see 5xx error rates reduce. Next update in 10 minutes.

Mar 15, 14:52 UTC
Update - Actions is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Mar 15, 14:51 UTC
Update - Users of GitHub Package Registry (except Docker and Maven registries) will be experiencing timeout failures. This includes GitHub Actions, Packages API and Packages UI on GitHub.com.

Mar 15, 14:39 UTC
Update - We have identified the source of the issue with GitHub Packages and are working to mitigate the problem.

Mar 15, 14:22 UTC
Update - Pages is operating normally.

Mar 15, 14:20 UTC
Update - Packages is now experiencing degraded availability. We are continuing to investigate.

Mar 15, 14:09 UTC
Update - Packages is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Mar 15, 14:07 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Pages.

Mar 9, 14:34 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Webhooks.

entry.title: Investigating reports of degraded performance.
entry.content:
Mar 3, 21:14 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 3, 17:32 UTC
Update - Due to a GitHub Actions outage yesterday, users may see inconsistent or stale workflow runs while the data is fixed. Customers are not being billed for these runs and new runs are not affected.

Mar 3, 17:32 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

entry.title: Incident with Actions and Codespaces
entry.content:
Feb 28, 17:31 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 28, 17:26 UTC
Update - Codespaces is operating normally.

Feb 28, 17:00 UTC
Update - Actions is now experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

Feb 28, 17:00 UTC
Update - Actions is now experiencing degraded availability. We are continuing to investigate.

Feb 28, 16:58 UTC
Update - The Actions Larger Runner beta is experiencing issues with VM scale up which will lead to longer queue times for runs using Larger Runners. Hosted and self-hosted runners are not impacted. We're continuing to investigate and work on mitigations.

Feb 28, 16:49 UTC
Update - Actions is experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

Feb 28, 16:20 UTC
Update - We are investigating issues with Codespaces in the US East geographic area. Users may not be able to create or connect to their codespaces at this time. We will update you on mitigation progress.

Feb 28, 16:18 UTC
Update - Codespaces is now experiencing degraded availability. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

Feb 28, 16:05 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Codespaces.

entry.title: Planned maintenance on GitHub Package Registry
entry.content:
Feb 9, 09:09 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 8, 22:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 7, 11:52 UTC
Update - Due to planned maintenance on our infrastructure, we expect an interruption to GitHub Packages Registry that will last two minutes at an unconfirmed time during this 15 hour time window. If you experience interruption, please wait two minutes then try again.

Thank you for your patience while we complete this critical work.

Feb 7, 10:08 UTC
Scheduled - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.
